ygData.subject: Re: Assist Command?
ygData.msgSnippet: f8 just targets the nearest npc.  when they say the /assist command they mean in a group when you want to all attack the same npc.  if you target a member of
ygData.messageBody:
f8 just targets the nearest npc. when they say the /assist command they
mean in a group when you want to all attack the same npc. if you target a
member of your group, either by clicking on the person in the group list or
using f2-f6 keys, then type /assists or /as for short, your current target
will change to theirs and you will being melee attacking. this way everyone
in the group can /as the person pulling and all attack the same npc.

Shada Silverleaf, Level 40 Bard, Mithaniel Marr


-----Original Message-----
From: Lynn Uhlman [mailto:uhlmar@...]
Sent: Friday, June 04, 1999 12:14 PM
To: eqbards@onelist.com
Subject: Re: [eqbards] Assist Command?


From: "Lynn Uhlman" <uhlmar@...>

In a little confused to, when everyone refers to the ASSIST command are u
referring to the F8 key, or is there a way to hot key the ASSIST command....
just wondering. Thanks,


Humility
-----Original Message-----
From: Kimes, Dean W. <Dean_Kimes@...>
To: 'eqbards@onelist.com' <eqbards@onelist.com>
Date: Wednesday, June 02, 1999 12:54 PM
Subject: Re: [eqbards] Assist Command?


>From: "Kimes, Dean W." <Dean_Kimes@...>
>
>Assist is targeted on a friendly and then you automatically target whatever
>they are fighting when free
>
>-----Original Message-----
>From: Mott, Mike J. [mailto:MIKE.J.MOTT@...]
>Sent: Wednesday, June 02, 1999 1:33 PM
>To: 'eqbards@onelist.com'
>Subject: [eqbards] Assist Command?
>
>
>From: "Mott, Mike J." <MIKE.J.MOTT@...>
>
>The ASSIST command? Am I missing something here? I have never heard of
>this.
>
>--------------
>
>Lullaby can be very useful if you have a rogue and healer in your group and
>fighting multiple mobs. While you sleep the rest of the mobs, the rogue
can
>
>backstab the one you are fighting and the cleric can heal you. But I
>usually don't use lullaby unless there is a healer in the group and
everyone
>
>in the group knows what the ASSIST command is for.
>
>
>Lago Bardoon, 21st Rank Bard of Bertox
